title: RockBell
author: RockBell
content: How to Overcome a Bear Market in CryptocurrencyThis are just small tips on how to manage bear , when it comes to bear people are always scared of losing money scared of taking risk while some use it as an opportunity to make more fortune once they can hold while some become broke , selling during bear losing much amount of funds due to reasons some taking loan to invest e.t.c and so many other reason so am going to share some tips on how to overcome or manage bear.-Remember that cryptocurrency markets are dynamicIf you look back in history bear always follow after the bullish experienced  and the market is always made up of four phases which are the 1-accumilation2-makeup3-distribution4-markdown-During market lulls, enlighten self.During this period of experiencing bear learn more about crytocurrencies and also blockchain technology and also do more research on projects you considering to invest there are different platforms and books you can learn from during this period.-Leave the graphs alone.Once you keep steering at the charts then you start thinking and start worrying whether to hold or sell, put the charts away and set parameters  when to buy and when to sell it also helps.-Take into account the long term goal . (HODL)Think of the profits you will make when the price goes up when dealing with crypto you have a target once you want to go into trading of any form of investment holding for a long time is actually a good one and concluding during this experience make sure you are active  and educate your self more  , on things and guidelines that will help you succeed in any of the seasons either bear or bull.

comments.author: Hamphser
comments.body: 1-accumilation  ( accumulation)I should say that this would be the best thing to be done whenever the market do really have some deep reds instead on freaking out and whining around just because you've seen your portfolio is crashing.It cant really be avoided but once you are experienced then you do know on what to do.If you dont have money or funds to accumulate then it would be better to make yourself not to check out the market every now and then because if there's bear market then it would be always have that recovery.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Bear market is very frustrating to some while many are still see this one as an opportunity to accumulate and this is the best thing to do during bear market instead of panicking, though for me accumulation are only possible to good coins on a bear market because there’s a higher risk if you choose to invest on small project or in a new project, so better to always for the top crypto. Overcoming bear market is not easy in reality, you must have your good strategy and perfect timing or else you will just lose money again. Cryptomarket proves that they can rise again after the bear market, that’s a good assurance that investing on good projects can be more profitable.

comments.author: kryptocanon
comments.body: I agree with you, the term "Bear" in crypto could be frustrating, especially if you don't exchange enough stablecoin with you before the season come in to surprise everyone. But one of the skills I would urge everyone to dive into is staking if not day trading. Not everyone has the potential to master day-trading. So the ability to stake and farm in the bear season would go a long way as it would continue giving you a steady return pending the moment the market bounces back.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: RockBell on August 26, 2022, 03:56:41 PM-Leave the graphs alone.Once you keep steering at the charts then you start thinking and start worrying whether to hold or sell, put the charts away and set parameters  when to buy and when to sell it also helps.There is that psychological effect that makes us wanting to see the graphs. Whether bulls or bears, we want to see it at most time and that's what we want to see.That's why if I'm emotional, I'll just let it all alone and won't look at it every now and then. It is what I've used to do for any condition of the market until I've managed to have that plain emotion. But if you're not yet used to it, it can trigger you to sell at losses because you're looking at the numbers and the color red with your portfolio indicator which isn't really good.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: It's a great idea to share it so that everyone and the future investors/traders who are struggling with the bear market would know what they should do or in the coming future specially the newbies. Crypto currency market is hard to predict even if it's in the bull run that's why this is a great idea to let them know that holding and accumulating during the bear season is not bad. In the future they will realize that what they were doing was the right thing that helps them where they are today.

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: I would say in bear market if you can HODL then it's best instead of looking at the charts always and listening to all the rumours and fake news flooding the market always.But this goes with only some good coins like btc not the normal tokens that can dump anytime and as you said accumulation at this phase is very helpful in getting more profits when bull run is back.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: It's everybody's long game, for sure. The critical part of having to HODL is that you should consider everything to ensure that you are doing the right thing with everyone. Like how you can mentally overcome the disastrous thing that could happen if you think about your portfolio too much. It will take a toll on you, and that's not a good thing for sure. Just believe that you want something in the long run that you want to profit from but for now, just accumulate.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: You cannot overcome a bear market, you have to play with it to your advantage. This can be done by dividing you available liquid investable assets into positions to buy at. Then let the market move as it wants to check only when they start getting executed.If the drop is happening too quickly, just increase th difference between consecutive trades.These are also times one needs to isolate from the market, learn something new or spend time with friends and family. Don't let the market control your emotions.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on August 27, 2022, 05:22:45 AMJust believe that you want something in the long run that you want to profit from but for now, just accumulate.There's no other thing to do right now other than accumulating.Bitcoin's price plummeted again and it's seen on $20k. When it was on $23k-$24k, people have thought that they should have bought when it's lower.And when it does, they think that they should buy it if it goes lower. Let the bear market a big lesson for those that always tend to regret their actions of not purchasing when it's low.We're at low now and this is time for buying.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: If you already invested and if you used your own money for that investment, the easiest way to overcome a bear market are  Withdraw your Bitcoin to your wallet (non-custodial)Forget about it in next 2 yearsPrerequisites: your own money; no pressure to sell your coins for daily expenses; do research and know how long past bear markets usually lastWith altcoins, except Ethereum and BNB, I don't recommend to hold any altcoin in bear market.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Quote from: RockBell on August 26, 2022, 03:56:41 PM-During market lulls, enlighten self.During this period of experiencing bear learn more about crytocurrencies and also blockchain technology and also do more research on projects you considering to invest there are different platforms and books you can learn from during this period.The importance of research on any project at all in the crypto space cannot be over emphasised. Even the safest project still needs research when ever a new trend forms. Bear markets are two phased season. It could be a good time to accumulate so much and also it can be a time where so many projects that lack liquidity get crashedQuote-Leave the graphs alone.Once you keep steering at the charts then you start thinking and start worrying whether to hold or sell, put the charts away and set parameters  when to buy and when to sell it also helps.This where dealing with emotion becomes very paramount. If a trader understands their chart and know when to buy and sell the might simply put their stop loss and take profit because staring at charts consistently can trigger this unstable emotion. Hodling can be a better option but its best when the trader does it with funds that has no immediate use

comments.author: Dollar_Hunter
comments.body: one way is not to buy, and wait until the price really bottoms out, because in a bear market it is very difficult to predict the price of bitcoin and altcoin, because the market when it is bearish will be very volatile.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: Dollar_Hunter on August 27, 2022, 10:01:39 AMone way is not to buy, and wait until the price really bottoms out, because in a bear market it is very difficult to predict the price of bitcoin and altcoin, because the market when it is bearish will be very volatile.Needless to say that you can't determine when the "price really bottoms out", you may be waiting to game it, and you may not, then the price starts to go up and it may not come down to the bottom price you had the opportunity to buy at during that cycle, so if it is bitcoin you want to buy, as soon as it's a bear market you should accumulate, the price is already affordable and you do not have to wait for it to "bottom out". Dca is another way you can accumulate bitcoin in a bear market, and it is great to use it if you don't have any other strategy or means to go about things.

comments.author: Anguwa
comments.body: Quote from: RockBell on August 26, 2022, 03:56:41 PM-Leave the graphs alone.Once you keep steering at the charts then you start thinking and start worrying whether to hold or sell, put the charts away and set parameters  when to buy and when to sell it also helps.-Take into account the long term goal . (HODL)   Looking at market movement graphs always diverts attention, because you will begin to think of selling or buying more; however, once you take your eye off the graphs during this bear market period, you can hold your coin for a very long time, and holding for a long time to overcome the bear market will actually give a very reasonable profit. So, take advantage of this bear market, invest as much as you can, and then take profits.
